en: Customer: I bought a book directly with my Geisler Conradi GmbH, it seems to be on it too. Customer: When I want to open the message comes up "Oops! Customer: This document could not be opened. Customer: The File may be faulty, please contact customer service." Customer: As far as I can see it is a Geisler Conradi GmbH epub file. Customer: Can you help me? Customer: cordfroehlich@mentzel.com Customer: This afternoon Customer: Mr. Customer: Brian Löchel-Kruschwitz Agent: Hi, thanks for the information. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Is that the title of the book that shows the error? Customer: No only when I tap on it a separate field comes up with the message. Agent: Thanks. Agent: Only one book or many books? Customer: I have a total of 5 books on it. Customer: 4 of those work fine. Customer: Only the one I bought today is not working. Agent: Thanks. Agent: I will delete and add the book again. Agent: Please tap the sync icon on the home screen Customer: Right now? Agent: Yes, thank you. Agent: Do you see the book Customer: Now it's gone. Agent: Very good. Agent: Now please try the following: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside 'Repair your Geisler Conradi GmbH account', tap Repair. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now. Customer: OK. Customer: Now it's back. Agent: Try to open it, please. Customer: The same message is coming up again. Agent: Thanks, Brian Löchel-Kruschwitz. Agent: The next step  is to sign out on your device. Agent: Before doing it, I would like you to consider that any annotation that you have made in your books may be deleted, as well as filters, reading progress, downloads and other customization. Agent: If you have third party ebooks, they may disappear Customer: OK. Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Geisler Conradi GmbH, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Customer: I have unsubscribed. Agent: Correct Agent: Now, please select language and WI-Fi Customer: It's connected. Agent: Thanks. Agent: Enter your email address and password on the Geisler Conradi GmbH. Customer: I'm logged in. Agent: Please open the book. Customer: It works. Customer: Thank you so much for your help. Customer: Have a nice evening. Agent: I am glad to know that. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Agent: Thanks, the same for you! Customer: No thanks. Agent: Thank you for contacting Geisler Conradi GmbH; it was my pleasure to assist you today.

en: Customer: If I download a book to the Zahn e.G., I receive the message "Your Zahn e.G. does not authorize this book." Customer: New ALPHANUMERIC_ID# and release in Zahn e.G. didn't help at all? Customer: Tel 08381 694459 Customer: milankabus@van.org Customer: I don't buy any at all, because I only borrow through the library. Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: If I download a book to the Zahn e.G., I receive the message "Your Zahn e.G. does not authorize this book". Customer: Are there any problems? Agent: Hqave you verified your Zahn e.G. and Zahn e.G. are ahutorized? Agent: You mean form us? Agent: No, we don;'t have reports or any issues Customer: Yes, we redid both and use version 4.5... Customer: I thought maybe they have heard about these problems before. Agent: I'm afraid is the first time we have a report for this type of issue, Have you tried to delete the book, and re enter the authorization? Customer: Yes we have deleted all the books, reauthorized everything again, and downloaded new books. Agent: And the new books worked? Agent: or this iisue comes only for one book? Customer: No, it happens with all the books, that's why I asked the question about Zahn e.G., because it's probably a general problem. Agent: So first let's verify all your authorized devices Agent: Verify authorized accounts Agent: Zahn e.G. > Zahn e.G. > Gear > Authorization Information + on the Zahn e.G. : Settings > Account Agent: Then on the Zahn e.G. program Agent: Zahn e.G. on Computers > Help > Authorization Information Agent: Now on that, please check the authorized credentials match on both devices Customer: Okay, all of them say unauthorized, how can I check that more accurately? Customer: Yes both the email addresses. Agent: Yes for more accurately, now please check that both devices have the same match of the date, month, and and hour Customer: Yes both right time and date. Agent: Thank you now, first delete all the books from the Zahn e.G. and the computer, meaning  only the books from Zahn e.G. Customer: Okay, done. Agent: Thankyou, now please deathorize both devices again Customer: Ok, both deleted. Agent: Thank you so much, now, close the app on the computer, then open it again and authorize the Zahn e.G. Agent: i mean the computer first the computer Customer: So first computer, then Zahn e.G.? Agent: Yes please Customer: Ok, done. Agent: Thank you, you are doing great, so next please verified both devices are matched again Customer: Yes, they are. I see the Zahn e.G. in Lotte Weinhold MBA. Agent: Thank you, nos please download the books again, eject the Zahn e.G. and then try to open the books Customer: Okay, let me test it. Agent: Thank you so much Agent: We are here in case you run intro other problem Customer: Ok, seems to work. Customer: Thank you. Agent: That is fantastic! Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Agent: Thank you for contacting Zahn e.G., it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day. Customer: Zahn e.G. I will do. It is a very nice and good service, although it took a while, until I reached a person, they were very helpful.

Agent: 2. Agent: Tippe unten rechts auf dem Bildschirm auf das Symbol Mehr (3 horizontale Linien). Agent: 3. Agent: Tippe auf Einstellungen. Agent: 4. Agent: Tippe auf Geräteinformationen. Agent: 5. Agent: Leider sind die Preise der Artikel so, wie sie online angezeigt werden. Wir können diese nicht für dich ändern oder reduzieren Agent: Die Vorlaufzeiten sind wie auf der Webseite angegeben. Agent: Da wir keinen Lagerbestand haben, werden alle Artikel auf Bestellung gefertigt, hier bei http://bonbach.com/ an uns versendet und dann an dich verschickt. Agent: Deshalb bitten wir dich, diese Vorlaufzeiten zu berücksichtigen. Agent: Die angegebene Vorlaufzeit ist der Zeitpunkt, an dem die nächste Charge ankommen soll. en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I am a very good customer of yours, have already completely furnished 2 apartments with your furniture. Customer: Wanted to ask the best price for the gray leather sofa Odelle. Customer: The delivery time frame has now been extended again, is it reliable this time? Customer: Thank you. Customer: Best regards, Customer: Emil Grein Groth Customer: Is there is no phone number? A chat where you have to wait for 30 minutes is not a chat! Customer: Unfortunately, nothing changes regarding the waiting position...I will give up again soon because this just doesn't work. Customer: Hello Customer: Hello Agent: Good Afternoon Emil Grein Groth Agent: Thanks for contacting Trommler AG & Co. KGaA, you are through to Emil Grein Groth. Agent: Regrettably the prices of the items are as they show online, we cannot change or reduce this for you Agent: The lead times are as advertised on the website. Agent: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at http://bonbach.com/ and then sent onto yourselves. Agent: That is why we ask that you allow these lead times please. Agent: The lead time showing is when the next batch is due to arrive. Customer: This is not a satisfactory answer and the waiting time was not worth it. Customer: Do you offer a premium customer status? Customer: Is there a premium customer status with you? Agent: I am sorry but we cannot reduce the price of the items online. Customer: What vouchers??? Customer: At my last order my voucher was not applied. Customer: I had not received my voucher credited at the last order!

de: Kunde: Kann ich eine Bestellung auch jetzt schon aufgeben und Anfang Juni erst liefern lassen? Agent: Guten Tag Micha Scholz, danke, dass Sie sich mit https://textor.de/ in Verbindung gesetzt haben. Mein Name ist Micha Scholz Agent: Sicher. Wenn Sie eine Bestellung der Artikel aufgeben, die Sie kaufen möchten, können wir diese dann „zurückhalten“. Dadurch wird verhindert, dass die Sendungen an den Spediteur übergeben werden, bis Sie bereit sind, sie in Empfang zu nehmen. Kunde: Kann ich im Bestellvorgang einen Termin eingeben? Agent: Nein, Sie können keinen Termin eingeben, Sie müssen die Bestellung aufgeben, und wir können die Artikel dann für Sie zurückstellen, zunächst für drei Monate. Agent: Kann ich Ihnen heute Nachmittag mit noch etwas anderem behilflich sein? Agent: Vielen Dank, dass Sie sich die Zeit genommen haben, heute mit mir zu sprechen, und ich hoffe, dass es mir gelungen ist, Ihre Frage zu klären. Wenn es Ihnen nichts ausmachen würde, unseren heutigen Chat auf der Grundlage meiner Kundendienstfähigkeiten zu bewerten, wäre ich Ihnen sehr dankbar. Agent: Ich hoffe, Sie haben einen schönen Tag und bitte melden Sie sich erneut bei uns, wenn Sie weitere Hilfe benötigen.
en: Customer: Can I place an order now and have it delivered at the beginning of June? Agent: Good Afternoon Micha Scholz, thank you for getting in contact with https://textor.de/, you're through to Micha Scholz Agent: Absolutely, if you place an order for the items you wish to purchase we would then be able to place a "hold" on these, this would prevent the items being shipped to the carrier until you are ready to receive them Customer: Hello Micha Scholz, is it also possible to get a small sample piece of furniture wood in advance? Customer: It will be combined with existing furniture and so we could check beforehand whether it fits in color Agent: I am afraid we do not currently offer samples our wooden items, I do apologise about this Customer: Okay, then this is it. Customer: I would like to order 3 items from the Tintzmann Hänel AG & Co. KGaA for June. Customer: Can I enter an delivery day in the order process? Agent: No you wouldn't be able to enter an appointment date, you would need to place the order and we would then we can place the items on hold for you, we can place these on hold initially for three months Agent: Is there anything else I can help with this afternoon for you? Agent: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat. Agent: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.

43206 Nordhausen, 06101293864 Agent: Vielen Dank, einen Moment Agent: Okay, Janine Löwer - der Artikel ist derzeit nicht vorrätig, daher kann ich ihn nicht für Sie nachbestellen - wir können nicht nur die Schublade bekommen, daher kann ich arrangieren, dass der Artikel abgeholt und vollständig erstattet wird. Alternativ kann ich Ihnen eine 50€-Rückerstattung anbieten, um den Artikel so zu behalten, wie er ist - wenn Sie denken, dass dieses Problem behoben werden kann Kunde: Es ist denn abzusehen, wann der Schrank wieder geliefert werden könnte? en:
Customer: Hello, I already wrote to one of your colleagues yesterday and received no answer so far. Customer: It's about my closet that arrived the day before yesterday (order number: MJFNDEWM69H). Customer: The right drawer does not fit into the closet. Customer: Please contact me as soon as possible. Customer: The closet can't be used like this at the moment. Agent: Good afternoon Agent: Thanks for contacting Blümel, you are through to Janine Löwer Agent: So that I can assist you can you please provide your account details (Full Name, E-mail address, Postal Address and Order Number) Customer: Zirmeplatz 0
43206 Nordhausen, 06101293864 Agent: Thank you - one moment Agent: Okay Janine Löwer - so the item is currently out of stock, so I would be unable to reorder this for you - we would not be able to get just the drawer, so I can arrange the item is collected and fully refunded, alternatively, I can offer you  a 50€ refund to keep the item as is - if you think this problem can be rectified Customer: Is it foreseeable when the closet could be delivered again? Customer: Keeping it like this is not an option for me... Agent: Okay I understand - we do not have any dates for the item coming back in, so if you do not want to keep as is, then we would need to arrange the collection and a full refund for you Customer: Alright. Customer: Does the closet need to be completely disassembled for collection and refund? Customer: And when would the pick-up be? Agent: Yes, regrettably the item would need to be dismantled and packaged, as this is with Blümel, I can arrange the collection for you and they will be in touch directly to organise the collection date, they are normally pretty quick though Customer: I no longer have the original packaging. Agent: Okay, do you have any way to source packaging to get the item ready for the collection Customer: No, it is not possible for me to get another type of packaging. Customer: I will be able to dismantle the closet and provide it to the shipping company in this way. Agent: Okay bear with me Agent: Okay, so I can arrange the collection for you - but in the current climate, I cannot guarantee that Blümel would be able to supply packaging for you, but you can liaise with them, once they are in touch with you regarding the collection Customer: Blümel must be able to guarantee that the defective closet will be picked up promptly. Customer: And I ask you to arrange that now. Customer: I do not have a suitable packaging, but I will disassemble the closet as far as possible for the pick-up - they have to clarify with Blümel how this can then work. Customer: Blümel can contact me at any time by telephone to arrange a pick-up date. Agent: I am speaking with a manger Janine Löwer - please leave this with me and someone will be in touch with you and we will also arrange the collection for you Customer: That's good, thank you. Customer: I expect to receive feedback at the beginning of next week at the latest. Customer: Thank you for your support Janine Löwer. Agent: Yes of course Janine Löwer - please leave this with me so I can arrange something for you Agent: Have a good day

Agent: Okay, aufgrund der Länge der Zeit, die Sie den Artikel hatten, und der Tatsache, dass wir dieses Stuhl nicht mehr auf Lager haben, kann ich leider nichts anderes tun, als Ihnen einen Gutschein als Entschuldigung anzubieten - 20 Euro Kunde: Danke für die Nachricht Kunde: aber warum nur 20 EUR? Kunde: Der Ursprungswert von diesem Stuhl betrug 9 EUR Agent: Das Stuhl war ursprünglich €9 Kunde: Außerdem sind wir bereits "Stammkunde" bei Ihnen und haben schon sehr viele Artikel gekauft Kunde: Aber warum bieten Sie mir dann nur 20EUR an? Agent: Als Geste des guten Willens, um uns dafür zu entschuldigen Kunde: Der Stuhl ist aber defekt. Kunde: Da helfen uns die 20€ leider auch nicht. Kunde: Das sind gesetzliche Gewährleistungsansprüche. Kunde: Das absolute Minimum wäre doch, dass sie den defekten Stuhl zurücknehmen. Kunde: Das ist neben der gesetzlichen Verpflichtung auch Standard im Bereich eCommerce. Kunde: Bitte prüfen sie doch nochmal ob sie wenigstens den defekten Stuhl zurücknehmen. Kunde: Wir verkaufen den zweiten Stuhl dann privat. Kunde: Da verlieren wir auch einiges an Geld. Kunde: Danke. Agent: Da sich dieser Artikel bei Ihrer Ankunft in perfektem Zustand befand - Sie haben ihn jetzt seit 12/9 - kann ich leider nichts für Sie dabei tun. Agent: Ich biete Ihnen den Gutschein als Geste des guten Willens an, um mich dafür zu entschuldigen Agent: Ich habe mit einem Manager gesprochen Kunde: Bitte entschuldigen sie, aber der Stuhl wird als Bürostuhl verkauft. Kunde: Wie kann ein Bürostuhl nach 9 Monaten kaputt gehen ? Kunde: Die Gewährleistungsansprüche in Deutschland sind 24 Monate. Kunde: Das ist wirklich sehr schlechter Service. Agent: Ja, das verstehe ich sehr gut - aber das ist zerrissen/abgenutzt, das hat nichts mit der Qualität des Artikels zu tun. Agent: War das schon da, als Sie den Stuhl zum ersten Mal erhielten? Kunde: Sie können ihrem Manager ausrichten, dass sie nun zwei Stammkunden verloren haben. Kunde: Mein Freund hat ebenfalls über seinen Account diverse Möbel für unsere Wohnung bestellt. Kunde: Das werden wir nun nicht mehr machen. Kunde: Nein, der Defekt ist erst nach einigen Monaten aufgetreten. Kunde: Ein Bürostuhl muss eine normale Nutzung aushalten. Kunde: Sonst dürfen sie ihn nicht als Bürostuhl verkaufen. Kunde: Unabhängig davon, gilt die Gewährleistung von 24 Monaten. Agent: Okay, haben Sie uns nach den paar Monaten, in denen das passiert ist, darüber informiert? Kunde: Offensichtlich hatte der Stuhl einen nicht ersichtlichen Mangel bei Verkauf. Kunde: Wie kann so ein Polsterschaden nach 9 Monaten ansonsten auftreten ? Agent: Okay, haben Sie uns nach den paar Monaten, in denen das passiert ist, darüber informiert? Kunde: Ja, ich habe mich bereits vor einigen Monaten gemeldet. Kunde: Da wurden leider alle Gewährleistungsansprüche abgelehnt. Kunde: Wir haben uns rechtlich nochmal informiert und haben sie deswegen nochmal angeschrieben. Kunde: Wir haben uns ursprünglich schon vor einem halben Jahr gemeldet. Agent: Bitte haben Sie Geduld mit mir, während ich mir diese Informationen ansehe Kunde: Ok, danke Agent: Okay, ich sehe den bisherigen Schriftverkehr - leider können wir in dieser Sache nicht weitermachen - es tut mir sehr leid für die Enttäuschung. Kunde: In Ordnung. Kunde: Wir werden nichts mehr bei ihnen bestellen. Customer: Hello, I ordered two Gute GmbH on 12.12.19. Customer: One of them already has a defect after a relatively short time (the fabric has a hole at the front part of the chair). Customer: I am asking for your support. Customer: Thank you! Agent: Good afternoon Agent: Thanks for contacting Gute GmbH, you are through to Reimer Segebahn-Girschner. Agent: So that I can assist you can you please provide your account details (Full Name, E-mail address, Postal Address and Order Number) Customer: Eugen-Pergande-Weg 4
81494 Diepholz, nfroehlich@aol.de, Eugen-Pergande-Weg 4
81494 Diepholz, +49(0)7174 135211 Agent: Okay, are you able to send an image please? Customer: A moment please. Agent: And which one is the item please - as you have 2 different chairs? Customer: It is the chair in cloudy gray? Customer: Image is following. Agent: so the Gute GmbH, Wolkengrau und Kupfer? Customer: Correct? Customer: Visitor uploaded: KLKZDEMC Customer: URL: http://grein.com/ Customer: Type: Image/jpeg Customer: Size: 9 Agent: Okay, so has something caught it and caused a tear? Customer: What do you mean when you say caught? Agent: Has something touched it to cause the tear? Customer: We didn't do anything with the chair. Customer: No. Customer: Suddenly the crack was there. Customer: I just sat on it. Agent: Due to the length of time you have had this item - I need to check with a manager - one moment please Customer: Thank you! Agent: Sorry, I will be with you in a moment Customer: Thank you! Agent: Okay, regrettably due to the length of time you have had the item, and the fact we do not stock this chair anymore, I would not be able to do anything other than offer you a voucher to apologise for this - 20 euros Customer: Thanks for the message. Customer: But why only 20 EUR? Customer: The original value of this chair was 9 EUR. Agent: The chair was originally €9 Customer: In addition, we are already regular customers and have already bought a lot of items from you. Customer: But why do you only offer me 20EUR? Agent: As a gesture of goodwill to apologise for this happening Customer: But the chair is defective. Customer: Unfortunately, 20 € doesn't help us either. Customer: These are legal warranty claims. Customer: The absolute minimum would be that they take back the defective chair. Customer: This is not only the legal obligation but also the standard in the field of eCommerce. Customer: Please check again if you can at least take back the defective chair. Customer: We then sell the second chair privately. Customer: We will also lose a lot of money. Customer: Thank you. Agent: As this item was in perfect condition when it arrived with you - you have now had this since 12/9 - Regrettably, I am unable to proceed with this for you. Agent: I am offering you the voucher as a gesture of goodwill to apologise for this happening Agent: I have spoken to a manager Customer: Please excuse us, but the chair is sold as an office chair. Customer: How can an office chair break after 9 months? Customer: The warranty claims in Germany are 24 months. Customer: This is a really bad service. Agent: Yes, I fully understand this - but this is torn/worn, this is not to do with the quality of the item. Agent: was this here when you first received the chair? Customer: You can tell your manager that they have lost two regular customers. Customer: My friend has also ordered various furniture for our apartment through his account. Customer: We will no longer do that. Customer: No, the defect occurred only after a few months. Customer: An office chair must withstand normal use. Customer: Otherwise they may not sell it as an office chair. Customer: Regardless of this, the warranty is valid for 24 months. Agent: Okay, did you let us know about this after the few months that this happened? Customer: Obviously, the chair had an invisible defect during sale. Customer: How else can such a padding damage occur after only 9 months? Agent: Okay, did you let us know about this after the few months that this happened? Customer: Yes, I already reported it a few months ago. Customer: Unfortunately, all warranty claims were rejected. Customer: We informed ourselves legally again and therefore wrote you again. Customer: We originally reported it half a year ago. Agent: Okay, bear with me whilst I look at this information Customer: Ok, thank you. Agent: Okay, I can see the previous correspondence - regrettably, we are unable to move forward with this - I am very sorry for the disappointment Customer: All right. Customer: We will no longer order anything from you. Customer: If you add the revenue of me and my friend Reimer Segebahn-Girschner (same address), you obviously lost a very good customer. Customer: You can forward this to your manager. Customer: This is not competitive. Customer: Goodbye
